metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4173 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the trend-data daemon (xymond_rrd) in Xymon 4.x before 4.3.12 allows remote attackers to delete arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the host name in a "drophost" command.

criterions.comment: xymon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
